title: NA passes unanimous resolution, condemns Israel aggression against Iran
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP): The National Assembly on Friday passed a unanimous resolution strongly condemning the unjustified and illegitimate aggression by Israel against the brotherly Islamic Republic of Iran.
The resolution said that the attack has caused grave loss of lives and property to the Iranian People.
The resolution was tabled by Pakistan Peoples Party Syed Naveed Qamar in the house said â€œThis House notes with utter disgust and dismay that the strikes carried in the dark hours of June 13, 2025 is not only a serious violation of the sovereignty and integrity of a United Nations Member state but it also clearly contravenes the fundamental principles of international law and the United Nations Charter.
This House warns that such continued blatant acts of aggression by Israel have brought not only the Middle East but the entire world into serious dangers, the consequence of which shall entirely rest on Isreal.
The resolution further said, Iran has a right to self-defense under Article 51 of the UN Charter.
The House reiterates that Pakistan stands in complete solidarity with the Government, Parliament and the people of the Islamic Iran and prays for those who lost their lives in this attack.
The House called upon the government to immediately call for a meeting of the UN Security Council and the OIC to discuss, condemn and bring an immediate halt to the aggression in Iran.
